containerTransport.title: Fast and Reliable Container Transportation
containerTransport.description: As Emkan Global, we provide container transportation services that ensure your goods reach their destination safely and quickly.
containerTransport.details: Whether it's domestic trade or export and import, our professional team guarantees that your products are transported safely, on time and at the lowest cost.
containerTransport.scopeItems: Packaging • Loading • Ocean Transportation • Container Tracking

dryCargo.title: Safe Transportation with Dry Cargo Ships
dryCargo.description: As Emkan Global, we safely transport your large-volume cargoes with dry cargo ships.
dryCargo.details: We provide special solutions for grain, coal, minerals and other dry cargoes, ensuring that your cargoes reach their destination on time and without damage.
dryCargo.advantagesItems: Experienced Team • Modern Ship Fleet • Trust and Efficiency

ureTicareti.title: Urea Trading
ureTicareti.subtitle: Urea 46% N — prilled & granular; reliable origin, accurate timing.

reliableTrading.title: Reliable Urea Trading, Strong Brand in Global Market!
reliableTrading.description: We offer high-quality urea products to the world market with modern marketing strategies. Trust, speed and sustainable partnerships are our priority.

whatIsUrea.title: What is Urea and Why is it Important?
whatIsUrea.description: Urea is a fertilizer that contains nitrogen in high amounts, which is necessary for plant growth. This product, which increases efficiency in agriculture, is one of the most preferred fertilizer types worldwide.
whatIsUrea.companyFocus: Our company supports agricultural production with quality urea supply and offers the best solutions to its customers with a reliable trade network.

bitumTicareti.title: Bitumen Trading
bitumTicareti.subtitle: Pen 60/70 and 80/100 — quality compliant, proper packaging.

reliablePartner.title: Emkan Global Reliable Business Partner in Bitumen Trading
reliablePartner.description: Emkan Global is a reliable business partner in bitumen trading. We offer bitumen used in road construction, asphalt and waterproofing sectors to our customers with reliable supply and timely delivery guarantee.
reliablePartner.guaranteesItems: Reliable Supply • Timely Delivery • Quality Guarantee

footer.description: Your reliable partner in global sea transportation and commodity trade. Fast at sea, transparent in supply solutions.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your reliable partner in global sea transportation, Bitumen and Urea trading. We create value worldwide with our responsible vision.

ourStory.title: Who We Are
ourStory.description1: We are a dynamic team operating in the fields of international trade and business development. We aim to provide reliable, transparent and sustainable solutions to our customers. With the experience gained over the years and our strong business connections, we actively participate in global markets and create value for our business partners. Professionalism, integrity and quality understanding form the basis of all our processes
ourStory.description2: We aim to be a reliable bridge in global sea transportation, Bitumen and Urea trading. We create value through operational excellence, commitment to ethical principles and sustainable growth.

focusAreas.title: Our Focus Areas
focusAreas.subtitle: We make a difference with our responsible vision, technology and quality-oriented approach, regional leadership goal and innovation spirit.

responsibleVision.title: Responsible Vision
responsibleVision.description: In all areas we support, we act with a vision that is aware of our responsibilities and tries to be a pioneer and example to society, aiming to contribute to the country's economy and employment with our investments.

technologyQuality.title: Technology and Quality
technologyQuality.description: We provide superior technology, high brand quality and dynamic human resources to our customers. We aim to increase the value of the products we represent not only within Turkey's borders, but also on a regional and global scale.

regionalLeader.title: Regional Leader
regionalLeader.description: We put forward the vision of being a regional leader in all international trade products, especially raw materials and food, and continue our work in this field without interruption.

innovationAdaptation.title: Innovation and Adaptation
innovationAdaptation.description: With our always innovative approach, as a product of all our knowledge and collaborations, we evaluate our wide service, knowledge and cooperation network in the best way by quickly adapting to worldwide developments.
